Privacy Policy for Winner Performance

Effective date: 01-31-2024


Welcome to winnerperformance.com. We are committed to protecting the privacy of our users. This privacy policy provides details on the minimal personal data we collect, how it's used, and our stance on the information provided through our platform.


1. Important Information and Who We Are

In alignment with our goal to provide personalized fitness insights by integrating with WHOOP data, we collect and store the following personal data:

  • Name: To personalize your experience on our platform.
  • Whoop API Info: To retrieve your fitness and wellness data from WHOOP.

No other personal data is collected or stored by winnerperformance.com.


2. Use of Your Personal Data

The personal data we collect is exclusively used for the following purposes:

  • To personalize your experience and present tailored fitness insights.
  • To retrieve your fitness and wellness data from the WHOOP API for analysis and presentation on our platform.

3. Non-Medical Information Disclaimer

The insights and data provided on winnerperformance.com are intended for fitness tracking and personal wellness improvement purposes only and should not be considered medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. We are not responsible for any interpretations or conclusions made by the user based on the information provided.


4. Liability Disclaimer

winnerperformance.com and its creators assume no liability for any interpretation, use, or application of the information provided by the user. It is the user's responsibility to consult with a healthcare professional regarding any health or medical conditions.


5. Data Security

We are committed to ensuring that your data is secure. Appropriate measures are in place to prevent unauthorized access to, or disclosure of, the personal data we store.


6. Changes to Our Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on this page with an updated effective date.


7. Contacting Us

If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data handling practices, please contact us at: pere.tarrida@estudiantat.upc.edu .


) }
